title: Luther, ex game designer at Kabam Inc does AMA - interesting opinions on loot boxes and pay to play

embed.description: My name's Luther, I used to be an associate game designer at Kabam Inc, working on the free-to-play/pay-for-stuff games 'The Godfather: Five...

body:
A very interesting AMA done by a game designer. Confirms some of the concerns many here are having with loot boxes. Articulates strategies of companies with games that have peaked aimed at milking the whales because the population is declining.

Very pertinent with what is going on with LoL right now. A good set of answers to common questions, provided by an independent insider.
